description.description: A description or summary of the classification.

owner.description: The owner or creator of the classified entity.

confidentiality.description: The level of confidentiality associated with the classified entity.

criticality.description: The criticality or importance of the classified entity.

classificationOrigin.description: The source or origin of the classification.

classificationMethod.description: The method or criteria used for the classification.

classificationAuthority.description: The authority responsible for assigning the classification.

classificationLabels.description: A list of labels or tags associated with the classification.

classificationDate.description: The date when the classification was assigned.

classificationStatus.description: The status or validity of the classification.
